00097 class FoamGridLevelIntersectionIterator

00123   bool equals(const FoamGridLevelIntersectionIterator<GridImp>& other) const {
00124       return (GridImp::getRealImplementation(intersection_).center_   == GridImp::getRealImplementation(other.intersection_).center_)

00127 
00129     void increment() {
00130         GridImp::getRealImplementation(intersection_).neighbor_++;
